ProjectTitle: Peripheral disease triggers and disease progression in multiple system atrophy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
01/07/2022
Please note the footer in your DMP gives the reference to different DMP, please correct this and submit as intermediate 
2. You don't have to list your own manuscripts and publications in a DMP. 
4. Metadata: Flowjo is a software, do you use this create metadata? For microscopy you may consider OME (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2, www.openmicroscopy.org/omero/), you can also take a look at the arrive guidelines for reporting of animal experiments, many journals ask to follow these (https://arriveguidelines.org/)
7. Have you considered using repositories for data sharing? Would IDR (https://idr.openmicroscopy.org/) or FlowRepository (https://isac-net.org/page/FlowRepository) for example be suitable? Reading the submission guidelines of candidate repositories may also help you to decide which metadata to collect along with your experiments.
label: intermediate DMP needed
